title: Mastering Houseplant Watering
summary: Learn the golden rules of watering to keep your plants thriving, not drowning. Covers when, how, and how much for common plant types.

title: Top 10 Plants Toxic to Cats & Dogs
summary: Identify common houseplants that pose a risk to your furry friends. Includes symptoms to watch for.

title: Decoding Light for Indoor Plants
summary: From low light to bright indirect, understand what your plants need and how to provide it in your home.
